visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly rainfall data with the series name 'Rainfall'. Additionally, specify custom colors for the series and configure other settings such as chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The x-axis represents months with styled labels, and the y-axis represents rainfall in millimeters with a styled title and labels. The data series is named 'Rainfall' and includes monthly rainfall data. Custom colors are applied to the series, and additional configurations such as chart margins, background color, and legend styling are set to enhance the visual appeal and readability of the chart.
